03afeeee55a727cf598a12ef1cf0386a064e9742.query:
INSERT INTO articles (author_id, board_id, title, category_id, anonymous, category, fields)
        VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7) RETURNING id

0606599be911fb20d416fd98e56aabe786139dcb.query:
WITH replies AS (
            SELECT abf.value AS id, abf.article_id, (categories.families && '{衛星}') AS is_satellite
        FROM article_bond_fields abf
            INNER JOIN articles ON articles.id = abf.article_id
            INNER JOIN categories ON categories.id = articles.category_id
        WHERE abf.value = ANY($1))
        SELECT id, COUNT(DISTINCT article_id) as "count!", is_satellite as "is_satellite!" FROM replies
        GROUP BY id, is_satellite

08a2f4be6bf7e693d0b1150fa2fea6dc6d023999.query:
SELECT parties.*, boards.board_name as "board_name?" FROM parties
        LEFT JOIN boards on boards.id = parties.board_id
            WHERE parties.board_id = $1

08fa6d03c815aa9a35a6c9864bfa69578d82647c.query:
INSERT INTO favorite_articles (user_id, article_id)
        VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id

0bf301c69184642edf8e8728b7e2c3263a5fdf07.query: UPDATE articles SET energy = energy + $1 WHERE id = $2

0db15c9a6e6b2f6f3508376d96e840f89fe6a32b.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                articles.*,
                users.user_name AS author_name,
                boards.board_name,
                categories.category_name,
                categories.source AS category_source,
                categories.families AS category_families
            FROM
                articles
                INNER JOIN users ON articles.author_id = users.id
                INNER JOIN boards ON articles.board_id = boards.id
                INNER JOIN categories ON articles.category_id = categories.id
            WHERE ($1 AND NOT categories.families && $2)
                OR (NOT $1 AND categories.families && $2)
                )
            SELECT 
        DISTINCT abf.article_id as from, abf.value as to,
        abf.energy as bond_energy, abf.name as bond_name, abf.id as bond_id, abf.tag as bond_tag, 
         metas.id,
                metas.energy,
                fields,
                board_id,
                board_name,
                category_id,
                category_name,
                category_source,
                title,
                author_id,
                author_name,
                digest AS digest_content,
                digest_truncated,
                category_families,
                metas.create_time,
                anonymous FROM metas 
        INNER JOIN article_bond_fields abf ON metas.id = abf.article_id
        WHERE abf.value = $3
        AND ($4 OR category_name = ANY($5))
        ORDER BY create_time DESC

115e3162f3fac9f2f805df118d1ed1a4b4b53abc.query:
SELECT a.id FROM articles a WHERE EXISTS (
                        SELECT 1 FROM article_string_fields f
                        WHERE f.name = $1 AND f.article_id = a.id AND f.value ~ $2
                    ) AND a.id = ANY($3)

                        (article_id, name, value)
                        VALUES ($1, $2, $3)

                SELECT $1, boards.id

                WHERE boards.board_name = $2

1a4e98bf936a2d308516cc28ac8d0b9d407e5364.query: SELECT kind, is_public FROM user_relations WHERE from_user = $1 AND to_user = $2

1dfba4063eb59e7d88aaae611dbd10d388013248.query:
INSERT INTO user_relations (from_user, to_user, kind, is_public) VALUES ($1, $2, $3::text::user_relation_kind, $4)
        on CONFLICT(from_user, to_user) DO UPDATE set kind=$3::text::user_relation_kind, is_public=$4

1fad9a11be067106f152f6af9b5bf889fa86987b.query: INSERT INTO users (user_name, password_hashed, salt, email) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4) RETURNING id

2021c37a761ee49208c539cd76192bbfd40cb6a6.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                articles.*,
                users.user_name AS author_name,
                boards.board_name,
                categories.category_name,
                categories.source AS category_source,
                categories.families AS category_families
            FROM
                articles
                INNER JOIN users ON articles.author_id = users.id
                INNER JOIN boards ON articles.board_id = boards.id
                INNER JOIN categories ON articles.category_id = categories.id
            WHERE ($1 AND NOT categories.families && $2)
                OR (NOT $1 AND categories.families && $2)
                )
            SELECT  metas.id,
                metas.energy,
                fields,
                board_id,
                board_name,
                category_id,
                category_name,
                category_source,
                title,
                author_id,
                author_name,
                digest AS digest_content,
                digest_truncated,
                category_families,
                metas.create_time,
                anonymous FROM metas 
        WHERE board_name = $3 AND ($5 OR id < $6)
        ORDER BY create_time DESC
        LIMIT $4

2365bf792a052456dbe52893734afe9cc9a9a969.query:
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE board_id = $1 AND category_name = $2
        ORDER BY version DESC
        LIMIT 1

25af72249eb8564302007c114ebd9a3d9d5f45ad.query:
SELECT count(*) FROM subscribed_boards
    WHERE subscribed_boards.board_id = $1

296ad24a0508a61e62dd39d5ed2ed1235a88caa1.query:
SELECT n.*, users.user_name as user2_name, boards.board_name, a1.title as article1_title, a2.title as article2_title
        FROM notifications n
        LEFT JOIN users on n.user2_id = users.id
        LEFT JOIN boards on n.board_id = boards.id
        LEFT JOIN articles a1 on n.article1_id = a1.id
        LEFT JOIN articles a2 on n.article2_id = a2.id
        WHERE user_id = $1 AND ($2 OR NOT n.read)

        WHERE article_id = $1;

2d680e691d71f2259578f9894d5b22d3ff786030.query: SELECT *, 0::bigint as "popularity!" FROM boards WHERE id = $1

2fbdaf88f6076824b4407f8ab57b26d7ccb62a53.query:
UPDATE chat.direct_chats
        SET read_time_1 = $3
		WHERE id = $1 AND user_id_1 = $2

319e1d5294248f489601eef9999e511e5a989d3c.query:
SELECT chat.direct_chats.id,
            u1.user_name as name_1,
            u2.user_name as name_2,
            user_id_1,
            user_id_2,
            read_time_1,
            read_time_2,
            m.create_time as time,
            m.id as msg_id,
            m.content as text,
            m.sender_id as sender_id
        FROM chat.direct_chats
        JOIN users u1
        ON chat.direct_chats.user_id_1 = u1.id
        JOIN users u2
        ON chat.direct_chats.user_id_2 = u2.id
        JOIN chat.direct_messages m
        on chat.direct_chats.last_message = m.id
        WHERE (user_id_1 = $1 OR user_id_2 = $1)

37142bcacc83f91e1938325b9b32ccd2001487e9.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                articles.*,
                users.user_name AS author_name,
                boards.board_name,
                categories.category_name,
                categories.source AS category_source,
                categories.families AS category_families
            FROM
                articles
                INNER JOIN users ON articles.author_id = users.id
                INNER JOIN boards ON articles.board_id = boards.id
                INNER JOIN categories ON articles.category_id = categories.id
            WHERE ($1 AND NOT categories.families && $2)
                OR (NOT $1 AND categories.families && $2)
                )
            SELECT  metas.id,
                metas.energy,
                fields,
                board_id,
                board_name,
                category_id,
                category_name,
                category_source,
                title,
                author_id,
                author_name,
                digest AS digest_content,
                digest_truncated,
                category_families,
                metas.create_time,
                anonymous FROM metas WHERE id = ANY($3) ORDER BY create_time DESC

4104756a533debd76145aad3cab2fd65d4869592.query: SELECT source FROM categories WHERE id = $1

        FROM images

        WHERE users.id = $1

4547a2f91c8468300eb16434264966fb94ab94a5.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                articles.*,
                users.user_name AS author_name,
                boards.board_name,
                categories.category_name,
                categories.source AS category_source,
                categories.families AS category_families
            FROM
                articles
                INNER JOIN users ON articles.author_id = users.id
                INNER JOIN boards ON articles.board_id = boards.id
                INNER JOIN categories ON articles.category_id = categories.id
            WHERE ($1 AND NOT categories.families && $2)
                OR (NOT $1 AND categories.families && $2)
                )
            SELECT  metas.id,
                metas.energy,
                fields,
                board_id,
                board_name,
                category_id,
                category_name,
                category_source,
                title,
                author_id,
                author_name,
                digest AS digest_content,
                digest_truncated,
                category_families,
                metas.create_time,
                anonymous FROM metas 
        WHERE ($3 OR board_name = $4)
        AND ($5 OR (author_name = $6 AND (anonymous = false OR author_id = $7)))
        AND ($8 OR category_id = $9)
        AND ($10 OR create_time < $11)
        AND ($12 OR create_time > $13)
        AND ($14 OR title ~ $15)
        ORDER BY create_time DESC

         WHERE inviter_id = $1

                (SELECT SUM(credit) FROM invitation_credits WHERE user_id = $1)

                (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM signup_tokens WHERE inviter_id = $1)
                as remaining

5329a4b6cb8a82925b168a66e8d83b7ee3ff51a4.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                users.id,
                users.user_name,
                users.email,
                users.sentence,
                users.energy,
                users.introduction,
                users.gender,
                users.job,
                users.city,
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'hate'
                    AND is_public = true) AS "hater_count_public!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'hate'
                    AND is_public = false) AS "hater_count_private!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'follow'
                    AND is_public = true) AS "follower_count_public!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'follow'
                    AND is_public = false) AS "follower_count_private!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    from_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'hate'
                    AND is_public = true) AS "hating_count_public!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    from_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'hate'
                    AND is_public = false) AS "hating_count_private!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    from_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'follow'
                    AND is_public = true) AS "following_count_public!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    from_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'follow'
                    AND is_public = false) AS "following_count_private!"
            FROM users) SELECT * FROM metas WHERE metas.id = $1

54ab110278ba4c4873a52a64e11212349f9749dc.query: SELECT board_name, id, title, 0::bigint as "popularity!" FROM boards WHERE id = ANY($1)

71f8cc3c0a5f9fe308895b573c55824bc7283fcf.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                articles.*,
                users.user_name AS author_name,
                boards.board_name,
                categories.category_name,
                categories.source AS category_source,
                categories.families AS category_families
            FROM
                articles
                INNER JOIN users ON articles.author_id = users.id
                INNER JOIN boards ON articles.board_id = boards.id
                INNER JOIN categories ON articles.category_id = categories.id
            WHERE ($1 AND NOT categories.families && $2)
                OR (NOT $1 AND categories.families && $2)
                )
            SELECT 
        DISTINCT abf.article_id as from, abf.value as to,
        abf.energy as bond_energy, abf.name as bond_name, abf.id as bond_id, abf.tag as bond_tag, 
         metas.id,
                metas.energy,
                fields,
                board_id,
                board_name,
                category_id,
                category_name,
                category_source,
                title,
                author_id,
                author_name,
                digest AS digest_content,
                digest_truncated,
                category_families,
                metas.create_time,
                anonymous FROM metas 
        INNER JOIN article_bond_fields abf on metas.id = abf.value
        WHERE abf.article_id = $3
        AND ($4 OR category_name = ANY($5))
        ORDER BY create_time DESC

9b7ab0b13a94e7dab8b9ad87316b71d40cef1cac.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                articles.*,
                users.user_name AS author_name,
                boards.board_name,
                categories.category_name,
                categories.source AS category_source,
                categories.families AS category_families
            FROM
                articles
                INNER JOIN users ON articles.author_id = users.id
                INNER JOIN boards ON articles.board_id = boards.id
                INNER JOIN categories ON articles.category_id = categories.id
            WHERE ($1 AND NOT categories.families && $2)
                OR (NOT $1 AND categories.families && $2)
                )
            SELECT favorite_articles.create_time AS favorite_create_time,  metas.id,
                metas.energy,
                fields,
                board_id,
                board_name,
                category_id,
                category_name,
                category_source,
                title,
                author_id,
                author_name,
                digest AS digest_content,
                digest_truncated,
                category_families,
                metas.create_time,
                anonymous FROM metas 
        INNER JOIN favorite_articles ON metas.id = favorite_articles.article_id
        WHERE favorite_articles.user_id = $3

a5694a6fc51bd98daf7d483a05402539226e6b96.query:

a7c7e6f40b37b0b46437dda8f6573bfc0925b2cd.query:
SELECT chat.direct_chats.id,
            u1.user_name as name_1,
            u2.user_name as name_2,
            user_id_1,
            user_id_2,
            read_time_1,
            read_time_2,
            m.create_time as time,
            m.id as msg_id,
            m.content as text,
            m.sender_id as sender_id
        FROM chat.direct_chats
        JOIN users u1
        ON chat.direct_chats.user_id_1 = u1.id
        JOIN users u2
        ON chat.direct_chats.user_id_2 = u2.id
        JOIN chat.direct_messages m
        on chat.direct_chats.last_message = m.id
        WHERE chat.direct_chats.id = $1

        SET (introduction, gender, job, city) = ($2, $3, $4, $5)
        WHERE id = $1

ce60d2217ab3c51f0a213d9bbb9c7a9dd4a66e0a.query: DELETE FROM subscribed_boards WHERE user_id = $1 AND board_id = $2

cf394dbcbf391ac4cf5c3da1477bae1ed003685b.query:
SELECT id, content, create_time, sender_id from chat.direct_messages
        WHERE id < $1 AND direct_chat_id = $2
        ORDER BY create_time DESC
        limit $3

d16b3b129a9299630b856ce420adb43e9f8d958b.query: DELETE FROM user_relations WHERE from_user = $1 AND to_user = $2

d3ac55606496f5a8a6be358c6e20a7d2959decdc.query:
INSERT INTO reset_password (user_id, token) VALUES
        ((SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = $1), $2)

dcf71e024bce8f58d3f9cb382f0b92ec7085b8b4.query:
SELECT a.id FROM articles a WHERE EXISTS (
                        SELECT 1 FROM article_int_fields f
                        WHERE f.name = $1 AND f.article_id = a.id AND f.value >= $2 AND f.value <= $3
                    ) AND a.id = ANY($4)

de0ad6b9556df4a670e1e8d7a98197595b305a43.query:
SELECT article_id, name, tag, energy, value FROM article_bond_fields
        WHERE article_id = ANY($1);

e52646e610c234c8271fbdb9c05db81df361e613.query:
INSERT INTO article_bond_fields
        (article_id, name, value, energy, tag)
        VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5)

ea99f300c01113ea32e5034897b12f2f14e1b43c.query:
SELECT id FROM chat.direct_chats
        WHERE user_id_1 = $1 AND user_id_2 = $2

eb5f911aaef8ad34c7bf53a5d787be36a9d44792.query:
SELECT user_id_1, user_id_2 FROM chat.direct_chats
        WHERE id = $1

eb8eea48ca99fc0446b6457aa7e7698ee0b36f32.query:
SELECT article_id, name, value FROM article_string_fields
        WHERE article_id = ANY($1);

ec3515677b92862026b92dbefb01389c8934076c.query:
SELECT user_name FROM reset_password
         JOIN users on reset_password.user_id = users.id
         WHERE token = $1 AND is_used = false

f1df4842f2a606e8cc26904c20883ec3a4e2288d.query: SELECT 1 as t from users where email = $1 LIMIT 1

f21253c14fb1eed7ee457445578aea3feb84f9a1.query:
SELECT
        drafts.id, drafts.author_id, drafts.board_id,
        boards.board_name,
        drafts.category_id as "category_id?",
        categories.category_name as "category_name?",
        drafts.title,
        drafts.content,
        drafts.create_time,
        drafts.edit_time,
        drafts.anonymous
        FROM drafts
        JOIN boards ON drafts.board_id = boards.id
        LEFT JOIN categories ON drafts.category_id = categories.id
        WHERE drafts.author_id = $1
        ORDER BY create_time DESC

f379223294faf8264e24cf5e16ff6b801cd050c5.query:
SELECT parties.*, boards.board_name as "board_name?" FROM parties
        LEFT JOIN boards on boards.id = parties.board_id
            WHERE parties.party_name = $1

f51b3c983436737b65808402a0bc1df03ae99912.query: DELETE FROM favorite_articles WHERE user_id = $1 AND article_id = $2

f56107cbee745899d91e3837684521e968f4d2d1.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                users.id,
                users.user_name,
                users.email,
                users.sentence,
                users.energy,
                users.introduction,
                users.gender,
                users.job,
                users.city,
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'hate'
                    AND is_public = true) AS "hater_count_public!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'hate'
                    AND is_public = false) AS "hater_count_private!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'follow'
                    AND is_public = true) AS "follower_count_public!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'follow'
                    AND is_public = false) AS "follower_count_private!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    from_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'hate'
                    AND is_public = true) AS "hating_count_public!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    from_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'hate'
                    AND is_public = false) AS "hating_count_private!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    from_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'follow'
                    AND is_public = true) AS "following_count_public!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    from_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'follow'
                    AND is_public = false) AS "following_count_private!"
            FROM users) SELECT * FROM metas WHERE metas.user_name = $1

ffb298750f0e662348623f8e6d8819e65b6018ba.query: SELECT email FROM signup_tokens WHERE token = $1
